definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
the person himself/I (humble form used in speeches)/oneself/myself/in person/personal
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本课时将近结束，大家可以休息一会儿。

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本课时快要竣事，各人可以休息一会儿。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a small corn seeder provided with a box-shaped baiting box;
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种小型化的玉米播种机。

sentences.english: But as you know, for you own vision is not something that you reason about.
sentences.chinese: 但是，众所周之，我们对于视觉本不需要推理。

sentences.english: Therefore, the dissertation concentrates on the research of localization in WSNs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本论文围绕无线传感器网络定位技术展开研究。

sentences.english: Publication of academic works on more than 10 articles and two monographs.
sentences.chinese: 发表学术论著10余篇和参编专著2本。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the monohydrate is not mentioned in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 值得指出的是，在本文献中没有提到一水化物。

sentences.english: The machine is controlled by micro-computer, and it adopts stepping motor to feed materials.
sentences.chinese: 本机采用微机电脑控制，步进电机拖料。

sentences.english: He bought an English-Chinese dictionary in order to look up the words he doesn't know.
sentences.chinese: 他买了本英汉字典，以便查找他不认识的单词。

sentences.english: This study demonstrated A. pseudoalhagi extract has no significant side effects on rats.
sentences.chinese: 本研究证明骆驼刺提取物对大鼠无明显毒副作用。

sentences.english: The subject of this study was the defatted fly maggot.
sentences.chinese: 本研究以经过脱脂处理的蝇蛆为试验材料。

sentences.english: This paper based on the boiler rebuild project of DaLian Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 本课题来源于大连海事大学的锅炉房改建工程。

sentences.english: The remainder of this section introduces those models.
sentences.chinese: 本章节的剩余内容介绍了这些模型。

sentences.english: You can find the information around this hotel from the information card in your room.
sentences.chinese: 有关本饭店的所有信息都在房间的信息卡上。

sentences.english: In addition to governance concerns, this part discusses staffing and portal operations.
sentences.chinese: 除管理问题外，本部分还讨论员工管理和门户操作。

sentences.english: The upper port of the leg protective bag of the utility model is provided with a pair of fasteners.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型护腿袋的上端口装有一对卡子。

definition: original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
this text/article/the main body of a book
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
